name: Lost Twin
description:
"A game with no hope"   

A Platformer and Shoot em up, with a protagonist who uses despair as a way to move forward, sad from her twin's death, she faces 5 levels alone, against the army of despair.

Control

   Arrow Keys   

    Z and X    

MG GameJam5:

https://itch.io/jam/magical-girl-game-jam-5

A game for the MGGJ5, where there is no hope. The Main character being the Magical girl, mainly using punches and kicks, with occasional use of her magical ability for the larger foes. During the Shmup Gameplay, she gets into a ship which can only work with her in control. Task for next time - fully read the rules.

*Remove Cookies for full restart
